Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Djedher with painted detail: a dark blue lappet-wig, a moulded face with a dark blue beard, parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the cord of a seed-bag which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the legs is inscribed with a column of blue painted Hieroglyphs within a blue border, there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
